About Me

Hi, my name’s Muye and I’m an electrical engineering graduate with self-taught programming skills. As well as tuning electronic devices I also have experience making full-stack web apps, with skills particularly in Java, Python and FPGA.

I’m a permanent resident living in Adelaide, but willing to move to anywhere in Australia for work within the next 24 hours!

Projects

ARM cpu design on FPGA

This is my final year honours project in University of Adelaide, which is an implementation of ARM architecture cpu implemented on Xilinx FPGA using HDL, along with a full functional assembler written in Java.
